code: import React from'react';import html2canvas from'html2canvas';import jsPDF from'jspdf';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Downloader(_ref){var htmlInputId=_ref.htmlInputId,name=_ref.name;function printDocument(){var input=document.getElementById(htmlInputId);html2canvas(input).then(function(canvas){var imgData=canvas.toDataURL('image/png');var pdf=new jsPDF();pdf.addImage(imgData,'JPEG',0,0);pdf.output('dataurlnewwindow');pdf.save("".concat(name,".pdf"));});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{class:"btn btn-primary","data-html2canvas-ignore":true,onClick:printDocument,children:["Download as PDF  ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-download"})]});}export default Downloader;
